stayOrHit: Do you wish to stay or hit (enter 'stay' or 'hit') ?
maxScore: Congrats, you have a max score! Dealer to play, hit enter to continue
playerStays: You have chosen to stay. Your turn ends.
playerHits: You have chosen to hit. Updated decks shown above. Hit enter to continue
dealerStays: Dealer chooses to stay. End of play. Calculating scores to assess winner...
dealerHits: Dealer chose to hit. Updated decks shown above. Hit enter to continue
numberGamesToWin: How many games to win a match?
playAnotherMatch: Enter 'y' to return to starting menu. Enter 'n' to exit.
